articles.title: Canelo Alvarez beats Caleb Plant by technical knockout, to be unified super middleweight world champion - ABC News
articles.description: Mexican fighter Canelo Alvarez becomes the sixth man to hold all four world super middleweight boxing titles at the same time, after his win over American Caleb Plant in Las Vegas.
articles.content:
Canelo Álvarez became the first undisputed four-belt super middleweight world champion in boxing history Saturday night, stopping Caleb Plant in the 11th round with two dramatic knockdowns.
